page.description: Experiences and outcomes Learners who have completed relevant Curriculum for Excellence experiences and outcomes will find these an appropriate basis for doing the Course.

sentences.text: General guidance on the Course

text.full_text: Aims As stated in the Course Specification, the aims of the Course are to enable learners to:

sentences.text: Aims As stated in the Course Specification, the aims of the Course are to enable learners to:

text.full_text: develop and apply knowledge and understanding of physics

sentences.text: develop and apply knowledge and understanding of physics

text.full_text: develop an understanding of the role of physics in scientific issues and relevant applications of physics, including the impact these could make in society and the environment

sentences.text: develop an understanding of the role of physics in scientific issues and relevant applications of physics, including the impact these could make in society and the environment

text.full_text: develop scientific inquiry and investigative skills

sentences.text: develop scientific inquiry and investigative skills

text.full_text: develop scientific analytical thinking skills in a physics context

sentences.text: develop scientific analytical thinking skills in a physics context

text.full_text: develop the use of technology, equipment and materials, safely, in practical scientific activities

sentences.text: develop the use of technology, equipment and materials, safely, in practical scientific activities
develop planning skills

text.full_text: develop problem solving skills in a physics context

sentences.text: develop problem solving skills in a physics context

text.full_text: use and understand scientific literacy, in everyday contexts, to communicate ideas and issues and to make scientifically informed choices

sentences.text: use and understand scientific literacy, in everyday contexts, to communicate ideas and issues and to make scientifically informed choices

text.full_text: develop the knowledge and skills for more advanced learning in physics

sentences.text: develop the knowledge and skills for more advanced learning in physics
develop skills of independent working
Progression into this Course

text.full_text: Entry to this Course is at the discretion of the centre. However, learners would normally be expected to have attained the skills and knowledge required by one or more of the following or by equivalent qualifications and/or experience:

sentences.text: Entry to this Course is at the discretion of the centre.
However, learners would normally be expected to have attained the skills and knowledge required by one or more of the following or by equivalent qualifications and/or experience:
National 4 Physics

text.full_text: There may also be progression from National 4 Biology, National 4 Chemistry, National 4 Environmental Science and National 4 Science Courses.

sentences.text: There may also be progression from National 4 Biology, National 4 Chemistry, National 4 Environmental Science and National 4 Science Courses.
